name: Rogue Angel
description:
Synopsis

Far at the heaven, there is an angel who was betrayed by the other angel. The angel’s name is Aziel, he was betrayed by Gabriel who wants to take the rule of the heaven. Gabriel makes all the angels in the heaven bow to him and to anything for him. Aziel have to safe the heaven and stop Gabriel, and for that he working together with a devil called Beliel. Together they can change personality in one body.

Well, maybe you asking why a demon helping an angel. It’s pretty simple, because the theme of this gamejam is “You are not alone” so we make the character is not alone.
